#Loading Clinical Data
```{r}
clinical_data <- read.table('trgn599.clinical.tsv', header = TRUE, sep = '\t')
summary(clinical_data)
colesterol_Dataset <- read.table('col.txt', header = TRUE)
summary(colesterol_Dataset)
```

#Generating Histograms
```{r}
hist(clinical_data$weight)
hist(clinical_data$height)
hist(colesterol_Dataset$CHOL)
hist(colesterol_Dataset$WEIGHT)
```

#Generating Boxplots
```{r}
boxplot(clinical_data$gender)
```
